testimonials.text: I have very much enjoyed working with Rahul from the moment he joined the company, he is an easy going, caring and fun member of the team. Rahul is able to pick up new technology quickly
Rahul is very talented, hard working and skillful person. He is fast learner and spontaneous person. He understands audience, client needs and plans accordingly.
